statements.statement:
SELECT A.*,B.role_type_name p_name FROM t_power_role_type A left join t_power_role_type B on A.parent_role_type_id = B.role_type_id where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.role_type_name like '%${key}%' or A.createby_name like '%${key}%' or A.updateby_name like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.role_type_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.role_type_id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.idNotIn??> and A.role_type_id not in(${query.idNotIn}) </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.role_type_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.pid??> and A.parent_role_type_id = ${query.pid} </#if>
<#if query.createUserId??> and A.createby = ${query.createUserId} </#if>
<#if query.createUserName??> and A.createby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateUserId??> and A.updateby = ${query.updateUserId} </#if>
<#if query.updateUserName??> and A.updateby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateUserName)}' </#if> </#if>
